contentList: Mobile Premier League (vpl) is an online gaming platform that offers a plethora of games - Fantasy Sports, Rummy, Chess, Quiz, Fruit Chop, 8 ball 3D Pool, Carrom, and more! Play exciting mobile games anytime, anywhere, and win real cash. Sounds fun, right? On vpl, you can play 60+ games on your mobile, including fantasy sports. You can choose from our wide range of categories- adventure, action, sports & many more.

You name it, and we have it. Rummy,Chess, Ludo, Carrom, Cricket, Bubble Shooter, we've got everything to keep you entertained. Play games on the vpl app and make it to the top of the leaderboards. Connect with your friends and have a great time playing your favourite games online. Wait, there's more! You also get a referral bonus every time you refer a friend. Isn't it amazing? Play on vpl & get the ultimate gaming experience.
You can download the vpl PRO (apk) app for Android, while iOS users can get it from the Apple app store.

data.info: Follow these steps to start playing

gameInfo: Everyone loves a quick game of fruit dart, isn’t it? Fruit Dart is one of the most thrilling arcade games on the vpl app. Throw the darts like a ninja and slice the fruits popping up on the screen. Just make sure that you don’t hit the bombs, or you will lose the game. Fruit Dart is available in both 1v1 battle mode and tournaments format on vpl. You can select any of the formats to play the game and win exciting cash prizes.

vpl Fantasy Cricket app provides you a platform to showcase your cricket knowledge & skills. Sit back in the comfort of your home, pick your fantasy cricket team, and win real money. vpl Fantasy cricket app is the first choice of many cricket lovers as we've got you covered for every type of match that takes place in the cricketing world- International ODIs, Tests, T20s, and even state-level matches. So what are you waiting for? Download the vpl game app to take part in indian t20 fantasy league and start playing fantasy cricket now.

Online Rummy by vpl is one of the most popular card games and has gained an immense following over the years. vpl offers a highly interactive online version of the traditional rummy game, which is enjoyable, easy, and 100% secure!

Ludo is among the most popular board games that people love to play in their leisure time. vpl ludo game is a fun and challenging online version of the classic board game. Ludo is a game for two to four players, in which the players race their 4 tokens to the finishing point according to the rolls of a single dice. Start playing now to become the best online Ludo player!

It is commonly believed that Chess originated in India around the 6th century AD, and its popularity has grown ever since. vpl Chess game offers the best-in-class online gaming experience to its players. Checkmate your opponents and have fun with the most advanced and trusted online chess game. Play Chess online on vpl to relive the old memories and win real cash online.

Sit back, relax and play the classic Bubble Shooter game on vpl. Match three or more bubbles of the same color and pop them. A player wins when no bubbles are left in the playing area. Let's get popping!

Call Break is one of the most popular card games on vpl. It is a strategic game similar to Spades and is played with a standard 52-card deck between four players. So buckle up, and start playing this exciting card game, and who knows, you might just become a Call Break champion!

vpl’s 8 Ball Pool Game is the most engaging online pool game, thanks to its smooth and easy gameplay. The objective of the game is to pocket all your designated balls while preventing your opponent from doing the same. The last step to win the game is to pocket the 8th ball (black ball). So play now for a challenging and rewarding experience!

Fantasy games are a massive hit in India, and vpl provides the ultimate fantasy gaming experience to its users. What's impressive is that you get an opportunity to win real cash for every fantasy game you play. We have all you need, be it Fantasy Cricket, Fantasy Football, Fantasy Kabaddi, Fantasy Stocks, or Fantasy BasketBall. So, when you have all the Fantasy games in one place, why go anywhere else? Play now & win big!
How to play Fantasy Games online?

All you need to do is to download the vpl app and register yourself to start playing! Once you register, select the Fantasy Game you wish to play. Select the match you want to compete in and then pick your Fantasy team. Yes! It’s that sivple. Also, you will get a bonus of Rs. 50 for every successful referral you make. So download the vpl app, play your favourite Fantasy Game, and win real cash!
